notifications.title: Shopware-Updates
notifications.alreadyUpToDate: You are already on the latest version

infos.backupCheckboxLabel: I created a backup and want to execute the update.
infos.requirementsNotMet: Not all system requirements are met for this update

message.phpVersion: Minimum PHP Version: {minVersion}. Installed PHP Version: {currentVersion}.
message.mysqlVersion: Minimum MySQL Version: {minVersion}. Installed MySQL Version {currentVersion}.

The following directories and files are writable:
{checkedDirectories}
message.writeableCheckFailed:
The following directories and files are not writable:

message.validShopwareLicense: Your current Shopware is out of date. You may want to consider an update.
message.invalidShopwareLicense:
No active Shopware subscription could be found for your shop.
The automatic update cannot be performed.
You can purchase a Shopware subscription in the Shopware account page

plugins.pluginNotInStore: The plugin is not available in the store. Please contact the author

updateModal.messageOkay: All prerequisites are fulfilled. You should create a backup before updating.
updateModal.messageUpdatableNow: You have some plugins, which needs an update before the Shopware update. You should also create a backup before updating.
updateModal.messageNotInStore: You have some plugins that could not be tested for compatibility. Please contact the plugin author for more information. You should also create a backup before updating.
updateModal.messageUpdateCheck: Your current version can be updated to version {version}. What do you want to do?
